_sText: Map Info: Its a fun map with breakable glass platforms and walls on the top, simetrical so its fair for both teams. Down in the map you can find a concrete platform where you can buy weapons and speeding ramps. The purpose of the wather is to save people who fail from the top. There are two teleporters these will teleport you back to the top if you want. > Extra < [x] Secret area; [x] Buyzones on each spawn area; [x] sv_airaccelarate 100+ for better results. Have fun and please give feedback.
